website_summaries.verdict: Quality handmade birch wood music box that has the option to have a personalized message lasered on to it.
pros: This beautiful hand-built box features intricately designed patterns and can even be personalized
Perfect for Harry Potter fans as it plays 'Hedwig's Theme
cons: Some buyers state this box is smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: This music box is tiny!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not read the reviews because it was a four star, however, I did not realize it was the size of a matchbook it is tiny...very expensive for the size, but it sounds great...that’s why I give it 2 stars. Seller should add something for scale in the picture, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Horton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sounds Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom because she used to sing "You Are My Sunshine" to me when I was younger. The design is pretty, and it's neat to be able to open the box to see the music maker (I don't know what it's called) inside. It sounds wonderful, and it was a great gift for my mom!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: For my sunshine
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend absolutely loved this and yes it is tiny but I think that’s what makes this gift so cool with the design and with the personal message you can place inside. I was looking at other music boxes with custom personalizations that I wanted to gift to my special someone but they were way more than what the seller here is asking for so all in all I’m glad I found this and it’s was a tear jerker! Thank you this was an awesome gift!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Duckworth

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this! I got it for my mom as a mother's day gift, It's always been the song she sang to me and now my kids. The personalized message makes it so sweet and sentimental. I know she is going to love it! I would certainly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Putman

customer_reviews.title: I cant lie. This is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I cant recommend this enough. Fast shipping & made in the usa but the well done job on the artwork & custom engraving I had done is really what made this worth every penny. Wish they had this box in a bigger size but this was a great purchase. You wont regret buying!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and only works while hand-cranking
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece and sounds great; I did not realize until I received it how small it is though, I purchased for my toddler and it is definitely not quite right for his age. I’ll still gift it to him now, and just put it up somewhere safe till he’s ready for it. Also, you don’t open it and it plays, it plays only while you turn it. Again, not a deal breaker for me, just hadn’t occurred to me until I received it that that might be how it works!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan L. Hegyi

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table item.
customer_reviews.text: This is on a small table in the living room where most guests spend their visit. Most just cannot resist asking what it is and then rotating the handle. It never fails to make 'em smile.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Myron Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: I wrote that like the song speak of gray skies
customer_reviews.text: I put a note in with this when I gave it to my daughter who lives in another state. I wrote that like the song speak of gray skies, yet we know the sun is still there, so with her, although we can't see her often because of the distance, we know she is always there for us. She cried. I've spent money in much more practical ways in the past, but this was certainly well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great giftGave two boxes away one that played over the rainbow the other one was something you are my sunshine they are great gifts I gave them to my daughters that are a little bit older now great guess they’re very very small however and I’m sure fragile so I’m sure if you weren’t careful they would break easily but I thought they were really cute
customer_reviews.author: julie Deuel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this little music box! I got it for my granddaughter for her birthday and I was able to have a personalized message engraved on the inside lid. It is just the perfect size and the tune of “ You are my Sunshine “ sounds beautiful when you crank the handle. The craftsmanship on this music box is beautiful ( I got the fairy design on the outside of the box) and the price was unbelievable for such a wonderful gift! I have two other granddaughters and I will be ordering them each one for their birthdays as well!
customer_reviews.author: Beeya72

customer_reviews.title: Can not be wound up- MUST KEEP CRANKING
customer_reviews.text: Must be made in China? The music box only plays while to turn the crank. You can not wind it up as you'd expect and sit back and listen. As such you have to try to crank at the right speed... very cheaply made. Additionally the unit is disappointingly small. About the size of your index finger...tiny.
customer_reviews.author: FR Dee

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and the music box part functions very well. The inscription was correct. This is a nice gift. I was surprised at how small it is, but that's my fault. It says right in the description that it is smaller than a credit card.
customer_reviews.author: FLAFarmer

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice; delicate and small. A bit expensive, but my mom loved it--this was one of her favorite Mother's Day gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Received someone elses order
customer_reviews.text: I received someone elses order that was engraved to someone else. So disappointed for it was a gift to my daughter for mothers day from my 4 year old grandson to give to her. He sings this song to her often. It was replaced but now not engraved at all!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Morin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your little sunshine
customer_reviews.text: The detail of the carvings are excellent and the box is perfect for little hands to hold and play.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery M Reed

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but beautiful. We gave it as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Tiny but beautiful. We gave it as a gift, and the recipient liked it. Not the best sound quality but is what you'd expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves it. It was her birthday gift from me and she still plays with it. The sound is beautiful(and accurate) and the box is also gorgeous. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dasia Zientek

customer_reviews.title: cute but had a cheap feel to it
customer_reviews.text: The music was good tone. box was a cute size just right for the gift I wanted. The craftsmanship had a cheap feel about it though as if it would tear up easy. Definitely not a toy. The laser work was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The intended three people I bought these for enjoyed them, not to mention my Grandson who really enjoys listening to the music. Could be a better price that was at the top end.
customer_reviews.author: DaveL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the size especially for what I paid for it. If you decide to purchase pay attention to the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this music box for our 6 year anniversary to gift to my wife. She loves it and it is the perfect size to put on her bedside table. "You Are My Sunshine" is our special song. Best gift to give your spouse if they're into small trinkets like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little music box. Way better than expected. Looks great and got personalized engraving inside. Will buy more for sure! Great deal and shipped to my door in days. Way faster than expected. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Music Box
customer_reviews.text: What an adorable music box. Like others have said it's very small. The music is beautiful. I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Hazeldot

customer_reviews.title: So small
customer_reviews.text: Was loved by person who received it. A child small for her hands. I myself was disappointed in the size
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: More for sentiment
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as gifts for sentimental reasons more than anything. Cute fragile box. Played clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality work
customer_reviews.text: I disliked nothing about this box, my mother loved the personalized message and thought the box was so nice it must have been "Handmade"! She was imoressed with the quality and the engravings are very exact. If I needed another, I would only get it here.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hronek

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So sweet! The mechanisms work perfectly and the quality workmanship it great! Wonderful gift
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: A nice way to say I love you with just a few dollars nicer than flowers and yet they will keep it for ever.

customer_reviews.title: Great little gift with a very sentimental gift value!
customer_reviews.text: Great little gift with a very sentimental gift value! My daughter loved this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: The perfect little musical gift
customer_reviews.text: Love this music box. A perfect present to my 1.5 year old daughter. If love can be expressed through music then this is a great way to do it. This is a timeless gift and always will mark the time and place.
customer_reviews.author: Club Chef

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely etched
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful music box not one flaw and beautifully etched on the inside as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Papawclp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy wood
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for our daughters. We sang it to them as small children.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift that arrived way ahead of time
customer_reviews.text: My son has been in love with music boxes for ages. It's the perfect gift. I sing him that song about every night. It made it well before Christmas. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: nikita wright

customer_reviews.title: Great little music box
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my granddaughter and she will love it.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice craftsmanship. Is a very good gift for that sweet one in your life.

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: Very tiny and overpriced. You can't put anything inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Knapp

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: the personalized message was just as advertised and the song sweet. I bought one for my wife for our anniversary.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Furtive

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great idea for a dear friends birthday. The quality was great, inscription was accurate, and it made my friend emotional when she opened it. Great product, great craftmanship, and price is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: FSimon67

customer_reviews.title: Cute little music Box
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mom for Christmas and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Clement.F.Nomani

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Well made. Beautiful music and the personalization made it perfect. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deeno

customer_reviews.title: Small but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Its very small but it's also exactly what I wanted. Its a gift for my mother and if I'm honest when I played the song I cried. I know she will love it. Very great detail and craftsmanshipship
customer_reviews.author: Cheylsea

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and I received it on Monday. I hadn’t opened it until right now and I realized it’s defective and it has missing parts. The handle doesn’t work and it’s loose. I have no idea if it was already that way or it was broken during the shipment. Disappointed. It was supposed to be an special gift.

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: RQ

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Small musical box that fits within your palm. Its bit expensive as compared to similar products but these guys customized the text and delivered it within 3 days which is quite less than the time taken by other sellers.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but not even close to being worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute idea, but this thing is tiny. So much smaller than I had expected

customer_reviews.text: A gift for my older daughter and the craftsmanship and quality is so on point , it is stunningly cute. She loved it !

customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the personal engraving. The description is exactly right! I would definitely recommend for purchase.

customer_reviews.title: My son loved this as a Birthday gift.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son for his 18th birthday. I’ve been singing that song to him all his life. He loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my mom as a gift for Christmas. It's cheesy and its real value is the sentimental factor but it plays the song perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: The box was beautiful. I'm sure my granddaughter will love it.

customer_reviews.title: Sentimental

customer_reviews.title: Felt kinda expensive until it arrived.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is so cute and perfect. Box is well made. Worth it

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my daughter. When you order it you can give them 5 lines of text. They were very fast. I had it shipped to me 1st to make sure it wasn't a piece of crap. It was perfect. Then I shipped it to my daughter. I highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Special Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for Christmas and they are were both surprised and loved them.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best customisable gifts within budget!
customer_reviews.text: The customizable text part is definitely the highlight! The cute little wooden box with intricate craftsmanship makes it a no-brainer gift for someone special.The sound too is really soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Siddharth

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I thought the box would play by itself after it was wound up. It’s simple and pretty but I wished it played itself. Thank you Ann

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect gift!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship; but tiny!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful music box but it is SO much smaller than expected. I had a hard time winding it up! My 12 year daughter absolutely loves it, but we both expected it to be able to hold small trinkets.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a memento from my son's childhood, and gave it to him for Christmas. It was everything I hoped for and even more. The craftmanship, music, in graving, and shipping was wonderful. Would definitely order from this seller again.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.

product_meta.title: TheLaser'sEdge, You are My Sunshine, Personalizable Music Box, Laser Engraved Birch Wood (Damask Standard)
feature_bullets: MADE IN USA - you will be purchasing a product that is proudly made by a family owned business right in the middle of the United States, in a town called Little Rock, Arkansas

PERSONALIZED - with the Customize Now button, you can have a very special message engraved on the inside of the top piece, select the “Personalized” unit for this choice, the “Standard” unit only has the song name engraved
HAND CRANK - this unit plays the 18 note song only while you turn the handle, playing the song in a steady but slow pace lasts about 30 seconds, and then you can repeat it!
PERFECT SIZE - designed to be small so that it easily fits in the palm of a child's hand, unit measures 2.5" x 2.0" x 1.75", slightly smaller than the credit card you are holding in your hand!
CHERISHED GIFT - best present anyone could wish for, perfect for a birthday, holiday, anniversary, wedding, Mother's Day, Christmas, Father’s Day and Valentine's Day

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars611 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
